]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * Handles creating a record in the shopping cart table.
 * @param {Object} params - The parameters object.
 * @param {Object} params.api - API services available for use.
 * @param {Object} params.event - The event data associated with this handler.
 * @param {Object} params.imports - Imported modules or libraries.
 * @param {Object} params.helpers - Helper functions or utilities.
 */
function handler(params) {
    const { api, event, helpers, imports } = params;
    const templateFields = 'quantity=' + 11;

    api.data.create_record_1.execute({
        "table": "x_cdltd_dropship_0_shopping_cart",
        "templateFields": templateFields,
    });
}
]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>adam.botens</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-05-02 20:42:48</sys_created_on><sys_id>a3fa08b3cc3d02107f4477bb15d90c02</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Add to cart </sys_name><sys_package display_value="DropshipNow" source="x_cdltd_dropship_0">c50b38615cbd02107f44e00391646b2b</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="DropshipNow">c50b38615cbd02107f44e00391646b2b</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_a3fa08b3cc3d02107f4477bb15d90c02</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>adam.botens</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-05-02 20:42:48</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
